related_post.text: Ok well I made a python program combining Quart and Discord.py. If I run Quart in development mode Quart works fine but when I just Hypercorn(production) it just doesn't work due to asyncio stuff. Well I implemented a fix https://paste.pythondiscord.com/puvunehavi.py but it partially works. None of the commands/events work but I can use the client object and make the bot do stuff. Any ideas on how I can fix this?

comments: Link is dead so it can't be verified but I can only assume it's related to Guoquings question
